events.name: Utah Utes at Colorado State Rams

headlines.description: Utah quarterback Travis Wilson ran for three touchdowns and passed for another Saturday, leading the No. 23 Utes to a 45-10 rout of Colorado State in the Las Vegas Bowl.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wilson's 4 TDs guide Utah to Las Vegas win

events.name: Nevada Wolf Pack at Louisiana Ragin' Cajuns

headlines.description: La-Lafayette beats Nevada in New Orleans Bowl 16-3
headlines.shortLinkText: La-Lafayette beats Nevada in New Orleans Bowl 16-3

events.name: Utah State Aggies at UTEP Miners

headlines.description: Utah St shuts down UTEP 21-6 in New Mexico Bowl
headlines.shortLinkText: Utah St. leans on D, claims New Mexico Bowl

events.name: Western Michigan Broncos at Air Force Falcons

headlines.description: Shayne Davern ran for a career-high 101 yards and two touchdowns and Air Force beat Western Michigan 38-24 in the Famous Idaho Potato Bowl on a soggy Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Big-play Air Force wins Potato Bowl

events.name: South Alabama Jaguars at Bowling Green Falcons

headlines.description: Roger Lewis caught a 78-yard touchdown pass from James Knapke with 1:04 remaining to lift Bowling Green to a 33-28 victory over South Alabama on Saturday night in the inaugural Raycom Media Camellia Bowl.
headlines.shortLinkText: BGSU tops S. Alabama on late TD
